name: WesternRiverFlows
0:
”Alexa, Ask River Flows for the flow on the Snake River”
”Alexa, River Flows”
”Alexa, Ask River Flows for the flow on the Green River below Flaming Gorge”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: river flows
Developer Terms of Use
des: Retrieves current river flow for many popular rivers in the Rocky Mountain West. The river flow information is based on active USGS stream gage stations which provide live data. This skill supports many of the rivers that are popular with river float fishermen and rafters.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
